comments.comments_text: Osman Bukari (Crvena zvezda) receives a nice pass just outside the penalty area, controls the ball and releases a powerful shot which ends low in the middle of the target. Even though his effort was not very precise, the goalkeeper couldn't stop it.

comments.comments_text: This was really stupid from Milan Rodic (Crvena zvezda)! He is booked for the second time today and is forced to leave the pitch after seeing a red card in the hand of Artur Soares Dias.

comments.comments_text: Mikhail Kovalenko (Pyunik Yerevan) shouldn't be surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the situation down well.
